name: knokUs
overview:
“Knock Us” for all your web work , and we deliver! KnokUs gives world’s largest platform for a wide range of Software Services and Solutions from web domain, starting from $10 to a maximum of $300*.

Our goal is to make services as cheap as possible so that everyone can avail these. We want to make everything automated so that it can be delivered with accuracy, on low budgets and on time thus saving time and money.

We strive to make your life easier and handy. We even assist you in such situations where you get stuck and find no way out.

At times, it’s very complicated to create a new website for your new business. Perhaps, a simple university assignment or may be a final year project is tough. What if you need a small payroll system for your shop? What if you want to have an E-Commerce Store to merchandise online? What about revamping/rebranding of your website? Being a non-techy, for all those tasks you wouldn’t like to go to software companies as you fear the fact that they will charge you a lot and a long process in bonus, Here Comes KnokUs. Let us simplify the process and help you reach your goals. We deliver your work in lesser time and involve less abstraction/medium as compared to larger software firms for your small task and thus safe your time and money. No need to worry regarding the process, just bring whatever you want, and sleep peacefully.

Discover what amazing folks at KnokUs have done for individuals around the globe. See products section for categories of our finesse work that we have delivered to some of our clients and the endless enumeration of work is still growing. We have constructed these categories from the work based on our clients’ real scenarios. If anything is still left unclear that is popping in your mind then feel free to contact us on hello@knokUs.com .

milestones.description: Our New Website Has Launched, Finally!
milestones.source_description: Our New Website Has Launched, Finally!
